cast.overview: Prince Amleth is on the verge of becoming a man when his father is brutally murdered by his uncle, who kidnaps the boy's mother. Two decades later, Amleth is now a Viking who's on a mission to save his mother, kill his uncle and avenge his father.
cast.title: The Northman

details.biography:
Musician - voice (tenor), piano, guitar, drums, bass, keys, ukulele, bouzouki, tiple. Performed at:

Electric Picnic, Australian National Folk Festival, Illawarra Folk Festival, Major's Creek Folk Festival, Féile na Gréine, The Seige of Limerick, UL IWA Blas Summer School, Saint Mary's Cathedral, Splendour in the Grass Festival, Ludlow St NYC.

markoconnor.bandcamp/music Collaboration with J Mascis - markoconnor.bandcamp.com/track/roll-back-the-years-featuring-j-mascis

Stage actor - Stage actor since 2010. Highlights include: Fr Flynn - 'Doubt: A parable', The Knave - '2 Gentlemen of Lebowski', Martin - 'Through a glass darkly', Laurence Sugden - 'Calender Girls', Stewart/Len/Roy 'Blackrock', Christy 'Lieutenant of Inismore'

Screen actor since 2012. Productions worked on include: TV - Am an Ghátair, Game of Thrones S8, Foundation, Conversations with friends, Sherlock and Daughter, A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms. Feature Films - Calm with horses, I am Patrick, The Northman, Clueless in Ireland, Murder in G Major.

Podcaster - Culture night 2020/2021, 'Remember Dolores Podcast', 'The Craic' on LCCR 100+ episodes.
details.name: Mark P. O'Connor
